inlinePayload.description: Search for lounges for a specific airport

airport.description: Three-letter IATA airport code for departure (e.g., IAD)

inlinePayload.name: search_lounges

inlinePayload.description: Get flight schedule information for a specific flight including departure/arrival times, aircraft details, and gate information

carrier_code.description: IATA airline code (e.g., 'AA' for American Airlines, 'DL' for Delta, 'UA' for United)

flight_number.description: Flight number without the airline code (e.g., '100', '1234')

operational_suffix.description: Optional operational suffix for flights with multiple legs or services (e.g., 'A', 'B')

scheduled_departure_date.description: Scheduled departure date in YYYY-MM-DD format (local to the departure airport)

inlinePayload.name: get_flight_schedule
